summary: Admin panel improvements fully tested and working. All 9 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verification confirmed: 1) All Talents tab has category filter dropdown with all 7 categories, 2) Pending tab shows detailed cards with terms agreement status (Terms NOT Agreed shown in red), 3) Terms column added to All Talents table showing checkmark/X icons, 4) View Full Details button opens talent detail modal with Declaration & Consent section, 5) API returns agreed_to_terms and agreed_at fields correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/talents returns agreed_to_terms and agreed_at fields
GET /api/talent/{id} returns agreed_to_terms and agreed_at fields
GET /api/admin/talents/pending returns agreed_to_terms and agreed_at fields
GET /api/talents?category=X filters talents correctly by category
POST /api/talent/register accepts and saves agreed_to_terms and agreed_at
POST /api/talent/login returns agreed_to_terms and agreed_at in response
All talents have consistent response structure with terms fields
Admin Panel - Pending tab shows detailed cards with name, category, email, phone
Admin Panel - Pending tab shows Terms NOT Agreed status in red with X icon
Admin Panel - Pending tab has View Full Details button
Admin Panel - All Talents tab has Filter by Category dropdown
Admin Panel - Category filter dropdown has all 7 categories
Admin Panel - Category filter correctly filters talents
Admin Panel - All Talents tab has Terms column header
Admin Panel - Terms column shows X icons for non-agreed talents
Admin Panel - Talent detail modal shows Declaration & Consent section
Admin Panel - Modal shows 'Not Agreed (Old registration)' for old talents
critical_code_review_comments: All features implemented correctly and working as expected
agreed_to_terms defaults to False for old registrations, which is correct behavior
Terms status is properly displayed in both Pending and All Talents tabs
seed_data_creation: Test talents created and cleaned up during registration tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel improvements fully working: Category filter in All Talents, Terms column with icons, Pending tab with detailed cards, Declaration & Consent section in talent modal. Test credentials: admin@bangalorefashionmag.com / Admin@123BFM. All current talents show 'Not Agreed' as they were created before the terms feature was implemented.
features_tested: All Talents tab - Category filter dropdown filters talents correctly - VERIFIED
All Talents tab - New 'Terms' column shows agreement status (X for not agreed) - VERIFIED
Pending tab - Shows detailed cards with terms agreement status visible - VERIFIED
Pending tab - 'View Full Details' button opens talent detail modal - VERIFIED
Talent detail modal - Shows Declaration & Consent section with agreement status - VERIFIED
API returns agreed_to_terms and agreed_at fields in talent responses - VERIFIED
